contents.text:
Student topics: github copilot
Weekly study hours: 6
Duration in weeks: 8

Curated resources:
{"rationale":"The student's goal is to become proficient in using GitHub Copilot for coding efficiency, AI-powered suggestions, and responsible use within modern development environments. The top Microsoft Learn module for these skills is 'Get Started with GitHub Copilot,' which introduces Copilot, its setup, features, and best practices; this aligns precisely with the student's time commitment and interest. Currently, there are no comprehensive learning paths solely focused on Copilot, but the provided module is detailed and covers both beginner and intermediate needs. Several relevant certifications also exist, especially the new 'GitHub Copilot' fundamentals badge, which validates practical Copilot use and responsible AI application.","learningPaths":[{"title":"Get Started with GitHub Copilot - Training","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-github-copilot/","estimatedHours":4,"relevance":"This is the most focused, practical, and up-to-date training directly addressing GitHub Copilot, teaching setup, usage, productivity strategies, code completion, prompt engineering, and security/privacy considerations."}],"modules":[{"title":"Get Started with GitHub Copilot","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-github-copilot/","skillFocus":"Comprehensive Copilot setup, feature overview, usage within Visual Studio Code, productivity, security, and AI best practices."}],"targets":[{"title":"GitHub Copilot Certification","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-copilot/"},{"title":"GitHub Foundations","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/github-foundations/"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate","type":"Certification","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-ai-engineer/"}]}

Produce JSON only matching the provided schema

{"rationale":"The study plan is sequenced to build Copilot proficiency from the ground up, beginning with introduction, setup, and interface, then progressing into hands-on feature usage, productivity workflows, advanced prompt engineering, and ethical/responsible AI considerations. By stretching the main module content over multiple weeks, including structured project work, review, and practical assessments, the plan is kept within the target weekly hours and achieves steady, sustainable skill growth. This approach ensures knowledge is reinforced before tackling more complex topics, and allows for deeper absorption even though the core training is only 4 hours—making full use of the 8-week schedule for true mastery and confidence, rather than superficial progression.","planTitle":"GitHub Copilot Proficiency Study Plan","durationWeeks":8,"weeklyHours":6,"weeklyMilestones":[{"weekNumber":1,"objective":"Understand GitHub Copilot fundamentals, its role in modern development, and initial setup.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Read introduction and module overview on 'Get Started with GitHub Copilot'."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Explore what GitHub Copilot is, its core purpose, and supported IDEs per module section."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":45,"tasks":["Review Copilot licensing, privacy, and responsible AI guidelines."]}],"checkpoint":"Summarize key Copilot roles, features, and high-level value to a peer."},{"weekNumber":2,"objective":"Install and configure GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code. Validate completion with a working setup.","sessions":[{"day":"Tuesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Follow detailed instructions to install GitHub Copilot extension for VS Code."]},{"day":"Thursday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Complete Copilot configuration tasks (sign-in, settings exploration)."]}],"checkpoint":"Demonstrate Copilot installed and working in your IDE with a simple test file."},{"weekNumber":3,"objective":"Master Copilot’s basic code completion, documentation, and contextual suggestions.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Try Copilot code completion across several coding languages (Python, JavaScript, etc.)."]},{"day":"Thursday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Apply in-line suggestions, block completion, and preview/documentation capabilities."]}],"checkpoint":"Showcase multiple code snippets generated by Copilot for at least two programming languages."},{"weekNumber":4,"objective":"Develop prompt engineering skills for effective Copilot use and understand Copilot Chat basics.","sessions":[{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Read and apply prompt engineering best practices in Copilot (comment-driven prompts, context provision)."]},{"day":"Friday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Interact with Copilot Chat in VS Code, run basic code-related queries, and compare AI-generated outputs."]}],"checkpoint":"Document three effective prompts and evaluate Copilot Chat’s usefulness for debugging and explanation."},{"weekNumber":5,"objective":"Integrate Copilot into daily development workflows and understand productivity strategies.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Practice using Copilot to accelerate writing tests and documentation."]},{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Experiment with workflow integration—refactoring, commenting, and code review assistance."]}],"checkpoint":"Present a short project (repo or file) benefiting from Copilot-driven code/test/documentation generation."},{"weekNumber":6,"objective":"Explore advanced Copilot features, customization, and settings management.","sessions":[{"day":"Tuesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Dive into Copilot settings: privacy, data sharing, extension management."]},{"day":"Thursday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Experiment with customizing Copilot suggestions, exclusions, and usage analytics."]}],"checkpoint":"Submit a reflection on how custom settings impact Copilot suggestions and privacy."},{"weekNumber":7,"objective":"Focus on responsible Copilot use: security, IP, and ethical coding practices.","sessions":[{"day":"Monday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Study responsible/ethical use per the module, focusing on code ownership, attribution, and security."]},{"day":"Saturday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Analyze real-world cases of Copilot misuse and discuss safe Copilot practices."]}],"checkpoint":"Create a checklist of responsible Copilot usage protocols for future reference."},{"weekNumber":8,"objective":"Review, consolidate knowledge, and prepare for GitHub Copilot Certification or internal assessment.","sessions":[{"day":"Wednesday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Review all module sections and notes. List areas requiring reinforcement."]},{"day":"Saturday","durationMinutes":60,"tasks":["Take any available practice quizzes (from the certification), and complete a capstone project using Copilot."]}],"checkpoint":"Complete the official GitHub Copilot module end-of-training evaluation and/or attempt certification practice test."}],"briefMessageToUser":"This plan steadily builds your GitHub Copilot expertise from foundational concepts to advanced, ethical practice—while allowing time for gradual learning, hands-on repetition, and review. Stick to the schedule, make time for real coding, and you'll confidently master Copilot for both daily use and certification goals!"}
